data.title: Director Oliver Parker talks Johnny English Reborn
data.meta_description: Known for shooting naughty school girls at the notorious St. Trinian’s, director Oliver Parker tells us how he helped resurrect hapless spy character Johnny English after eight years in retirement. He also spoke about getting together a stellar cast for sequel that includes Rowan Atkinson returning to the role of English, and Gillian Anderson and […]
data.text:
Known for shooting naughty school girls at the notorious St. Trinian’s, director Oliver Parker tells us how he helped resurrect hapless spy character Johnny English after eight years in retirement.

He also spoke about getting together a stellar cast for sequel that includes Rowan Atkinson returning to the role of English, and Gillian Anderson and Dominic West joining MI7.

Parker reveals just how naturally funny Rowan Atkinson is, particularly in the infamous chair scene, plus what he’s got against little old ladies.

Watch the full interview right now.

[yframe url=’http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q4sNdoLZwXo’]
